remarks: Ring multiplication operation for the constructed full vector space H. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvhfmul.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhfmul.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfmul.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfmul.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfmul.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvhfmul.m $e |- .x. = ( .r ` F ) $.
dvhfmulr $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> .x. = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( s o. t ) ) ) $.
$d E s t $.
$d K s t $.
$d W s t $.
